title: Four of Wands Meaning - Tarot Card Meanings

keywords.raw_section:
Upright Keywords
Reversed Keywords
community, home, celebrations, reunions, parties, gatherings, stability, belonging
lack of support, instability, feeling unwelcome, transience, lack of roots, home conflict

Comparing the Four of Wands across different tarot decks.

description: The Four of Wands depicts a couple which dances beneath the welcome wreath which is tied between four wands, which are crystal tipped. There is a canopy of flowers on the card which resembles the canopy that is particularly characteristic of the traditional Jewish ceremony. There seems to be a party that is going on, or some kind of welcome committee for the couple in question. You can see from the image that it represents a time which is sprinkled with feelings of fulfillment, satisfaction brought by the actual attainment of a goal.

upright.overview:
The overall meaning of the Four of Wands is that it heralds celebration as well as a harmonious, happy and relaxed home environment. In terms of numerology, the number four symbolizes stability as well as particularly reliable foundations. These are associated with a period of happiness and balance.
The symbolism within the Four of Wands poses that this is the perfect time for you to get together with close people such as friends and family. This could be with or without any special occasion. Oftentimes the card is known to reflect a period of holidays when you are together with your friends and family for an extended period of time. It might also be suggesting for you to invite your closest friends for a great and intimate dinner and share a laugh or two.

Oftentimes the card is known to reflect a period of holidays when you are together with your friends and family for an extended period of time.

Furthermore, if you have been working on a certain project, this card entails that you will be reaching a particularly important milestone. This is going to provide you with grounds for celebration which is also to be considered. You have managed to complete a proper and paramount phase of that project, and meaning you have every reason to be feeling proud and satisfied, which are amongst the general feelings induced and reflected by the Four of Wands card.
upright.love_meaning: This card is the card of family, of reunions and of festivities. The 4 of Wands tarot love meaning can bring about engagements, marriages, or other gatherings that commemorate you and your love. If you’re in a stable relationship built on a strong foundation of trust, support and understanding, your union may be strengthened even more with the support and witness of your family and friends. This kind of love is not just the love between two people, but a love that is supported within the context of a larger community. Should you be single, you may find love within these communities and gatherings.
upright.career_meaning: The upright four of wands is a stable and social card. It, when upright, signifies stable and supportive relationships. This sense of community applies to your work environment when it appears in this position. Possibly, you have made new friends at work or the atmosphere there has been particularly positive lately. There may also be work gatherings such as office parties in the near future aimed at bringing you closer to the people with whom you work. If there are, these events are likely to result in closer bonds between you and your colleagues.
upright.finances_meaning: The four of wands here not only represents financial stability, but it also indicates that you can be spending that money on loved ones. You might be buying gifts or taking people you care about out for dinners or drinks. These are good financial decisions. They might not increase your financial wealth, but they are beneficial to your social relationships and thus you can embrace them. Do not go overboard on anything, but so long as you spend within your means, the cards are encouraging you to treat those around you.
upright.as_feelings:
The upright Four of Wands reveals a heart brimming with joy and celebration. This person feels a strong sense of harmony and stability in your connection, recognizing that it brings them happiness and belonging. They envision shared moments filled with laughter and warmth, cherishing the solid foundation you've built together.
Your own feelings mirror this sentiment, reflecting deep contentment and excitement about the future. You’re inspired by the possibilities ahead, welcoming the idea of commitment or partnership. Gratitude fills your energy for what you’ve created so far, urging you to celebrate both your personal growth and the bond you’ve nurtured together.
upright.as_actions: With the Four of Wands in your hands, it’s time to celebrate and embrace community. You should focus on nurturing your relationships and creating joyful experiences with loved ones. Consider organizing a gathering or event to strengthen bonds, whether it’s a simple dinner party or a larger celebration. This card encourages you to appreciate the stability in your life, so take moments to express gratitude for what you have built together with others. Embrace this energy by engaging in activities that foster connection, such as volunteering or collaborating on projects that bring people together, reinforcing your sense of belonging and joy.
upright.love: weddings, engagements, gatherings and public celebrations of love
upright.career: feeling supported by colleagues, office parties, bonding with colleagues
upright.finances: financially supporting loved ones, financial stability and comfort

reversed.overview: If the upright position of the card reflects balance, stability, and harmony, the reversal position of Four of Wands implies that there is a breakdown or complete lack of harmony in your family or in your home. It’s highly likely that there is a lot of tension between the members of your family or other loved ones. If you have completed something that is important to you, you are expecting to share it with those that are closest to you, and to come home to a welcome celebration, but instead, you find a lack of support. This may leave you feeling rather uncertain when it comes to your own relationships as well as the things that you can and cannot depend on.
reversed.love_meaning: There may be some conflicts occurring when it comes to family and your romantic life at the moment. The 4 of Wands tarot love meaning can signal incompatibilities between your larger community of friends and family, and your partner, or the way that you are approaching love and romance. Sometimes, since this card is also the card of deepening your commitments on a more public level, there can be some fear and hesitation about taking these next steps. Change, especially binding oneself with another person, can be wonderful and rewarding, as well as terrifying. These emotions can exist together, but only you will be able to know whether it comes from a deeper place than just cold feet.
reversed.career_meaning: When reversed, the convivial nature of the four of wands is subverted. As a result, it might be that, at work, your relationships are under strain or have been harder to form. This difficulty can apply in a general sense to your office’s atmosphere; alternatively, it may be in reference to a specific moment or point of tension at work. For instance, there may be office events approaching, but they will likely not go as planned. Instead of increasing comradery, they might have the opposite effect. If there are no specific concerns in your work setting, it is likely that the card is highlighting the general state of your office. Perhaps the atmosphere at work is harsh or unfriendly. Regardless, expect ruder behaviors from the people you work with and be aware of them in yourself as well.
reversed.finances_meaning: You might be struggling against a poor economic situation if you find the four of wand here. Your financial troubles are likely linked to your personal relationships. It is possible that family expenses are weighing you down at the moment. You might be having a particularly difficult time making ends meet at this time due to these unforeseen expenditures. Be wary of friends or family asking for money that you cannot afford to give. Ask whether the money is necessary or just a desire on their part. If it is the latter, consider trying to rein in your finances first before assisting them.
reversed.as_feelings:
The arrival of the reversed Four of Wands suggests that the person you are inquiring about feels a sense of instability or disconnection regarding their emotions towards you. They may be grappling with feelings of uncertainty and lack of commitment, possibly reflecting on past experiences that have left them hesitant to fully embrace what could be between you. Their emotional landscape is marked by confusion, making it difficult for them to celebrate or acknowledge any potential joy in your connection.
You might feel a similar unease within yourself as this card resonates with your own emotions. You could be questioning the foundation of your relationship and feeling restless or unfulfilled as a result. This introspection invites you to explore whether external factors are influencing your happiness and encourages you to seek clarity amidst the chaos. Embrace this opportunity for self-reflection; understanding these feelings can lead to greater emotional insight and growth for both of you.
reversed.as_actions: With the Four of Wands reversed, it’s time to take a closer look at your surroundings and relationships. It may be time to confront any underlying tensions or dissatisfaction in your home life or community. Focus on creating a sense of stability by addressing unresolved issues, whether they are with family members or friends. Consider initiating open conversations to clear the air and foster understanding. Additionally, take action by decluttering your space to create a more harmonious atmosphere. Embrace this opportunity for growth by redefining what celebration means for you, perhaps through personal achievements rather than external validation from others.
reversed.love: conflict between family, community and love life, fear of public commitment
reversed.career: workplace conflicts between colleagues, office conflicts
reversed.finances: unstable finances, supporting family or loved ones can be a burden

abyss: The Four of Wands is a happy card, one I’m always eager to receive in a reading. It’s a card that signals stability and a sense of completion. In drawing the Four of Wands for Tarot of the Abyss, I wanted to somehow capture that moment of pure, unbridled happiness when you celebrate a major milestone. Reflecting on those moments when I have felt happiest and most celebrated as a person, I came upon the idea of a birthday party. The woman in the card is seated before a birthday cake, with a look of sheer joy on her face. The cake has been prepared to her taste, especially for her. We can almost hear the off-tune chorus of her loved ones singing “Happy Birthday” in the background. In a moment, she will close her eyes, make a magic wish, and blow out the candles to seal her wish’s success. Regardless of how old we are, it is a moment of pure, almost child-like joy and jubilation. The Four of Wands calls out to you to savor your success and take a moment to reflect on your accomplishments. There are different ways this can come into play; it may be an actual celebration, or it can come in the form of an unexpected event, one that will usher in a new period of your life.
